QuestData.Title: Storming the Citadel
QuestData.Description:
We have already secured ground near Nath'raxas Hold. It is one of the Legion's chief military fortifications on Argus.
Striking it now, and hard, may be our only opportunity to tip the scales in our favor.
QuestData.RewardText: If we do not act quickly, the demons stationed here are more than enough to overwhelm us.
